events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn't fit at all. I'd like to request a refund for the purchase since the size is completely wrong.
The customer reported a refund request due to incorrect sizing. Marking the case under the Refund cluster for further processing.
Assigning the case to support agent Emily for handling refund request due to sizing issue reported by the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like a refund because the jacket size was incorrect. I'll gladly help you with that.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or damaged in any way? This helps us process the refund quickly.
Sure, my order number is 5423789. The jacket is brand new and untouched; I just realized the size doesn't fit when I tried it on.
Thank you for the details. You can return the jacket within 14 days in its original packaging. Once we receive it, we will process the full refund to your original payment method.
Thanks for the quick help! I appreciate the clear instructions and will ship the jacket back today.
We have received your returned jacket and issued the refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for the transaction to reflect in your account.
Just checking in to confirm that you received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Yes, the refund arrived yesterday. Thanks so much for your help and quick response!
Closing this case as the refund has been successfully completed and the customer confirmed satisfaction with the resolution.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey to help us improve our service. We appreciate your feedback!
